channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Interdepartmental Academic Office reception on February 2, 2024
item.description: On Friday, 2 February 2024 the Interdepartmental Academic Office for Law and Science of Legal Services programmes will be available remotely via Microsoft Teams (by using the ID number 327 648 988 991) or by calling the phone number 02-50312473, from 9:30 to 12 noon.%0A

item.title: Call for CELI exams - A2, B1 and B2 levels on 13-14 March 2024
item.description: The call is open to register for the CELI 1 A2, CELI 2 B1 and CELI 3 B2 exams scheduled on 13-14 March 2024.%0APLEASE NOTE: seats for the CELI 2 B1 and CELI 3 B2 exams are sold out.%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Summer School in Sustainable Entrepreneurship, Innovation and Entrepreneurial Finance
item.description: Applications for the Summer School "Sustainable Entrepreneurship, Innovation and Entrepreneurial Finance" are now open. Doctoral students are welcome to apply until 31 January 2024. %0A

item.title: Call for the C1 Advanced (CAE) exam on 8 March 2024 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C1 Advanced (CAE) exam scheduled on 8 March 2024.%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details
